analysis.key_quote: Turning the federal bureaucracy into an arm of the administration in power, no matter which party is in power, undermines and threatens democracy since a free expression of ideas and approaches are critical to its existence and success.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, loss of due process protections, and the negative impact on institutional knowledge, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
